experience.title: Delegate
experience.description: I represented Politecnico di Milano in the METREX Spring Conference in Wroclaw, Poland. I attended a workshop organised by METREX as well where I worked with a group of Professionals and students on the revitalization of a Public square in the city center of Wroclaw, Poland. Later I presented my work to the members of METREX during the final day of the Conference and engaged in Stakeholder discussions.
